official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that television stations should publicize kidnapped children cases.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that television stations should broadcast a series of public service announcements publicizing kidnapped children cases based on information from the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that television stations should publicize kidnapped children cases.
